alert.note: Alert for Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 08 at 9:53PM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Two to three feet of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Southern Baltimore County and the city of Baltimore. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 1 PM EST Wednesday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, widespread flooding of roads in downtown Baltimore is occurring, along with the Pier 4 promenade on both sides, the Pier 5 promenade on the west side, and much of the lower Inner Harbor area. At 5.0 feet, significant flooding is occurring in the Bowleys Quarters area with yards, roads, and homes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 5 feet above normal. Moderate tidal flooding is expected during the Tuesday night and Wednesday morning high tide cycles. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NW Branch Patapsco River at Baltimore MD MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/04 AM 1.9 0.2 1.4 0.5 None 10/04 AM 5.7 4.0 5.3 1.0 Moderate 10/04 PM 3.9 2.2 2.8 1.0 Minor 11/05 AM 2.6 0.9 2.1 0.5 None 11/06 PM 2.6 0.9 1.3 1.0 None Chesapeake Bay at Bowleys Quarters MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.8 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/05 AM 1.4 -0.3 0.9 1.0 None 10/04 AM 5.1 3.4 4.7 2.0 Major 10/05 PM 4.0 2.3 2.7 1.0 Moderate 11/06 AM 2.0 0.3 1.5 0.5 None 11/07 PM 2.3 0.6 0.8 1.0 None Chesapeake Bay at Havre de Grace MD MLLW Categories - Minor 4.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 7.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.2 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 5.2 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/09 AM 2.6 0.2 1.6 1.0 None 10/08 AM 6.4 4.0 5.4 3.0 Moderate 10/09 PM 5.4 3.0 3.1 2.0 Minor 11/09 AM 3.0 0.6 1.9 1.0 None 11/07 PM 2.9 0.5 1.6 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
